price: (5) Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.[1779]
footnotes: [1779]- i.e., the revelation, which when descending on the Prophet (ﷺ) bore down upon him with a great weight.  Another meaning is "important ordinances."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
